title: Fix non-functional 'Login to Upload' button in Media Library

requirements.text: Debug and fix the 'Login to Upload' button in the VideoUpload component that is not triggering the Internet Identity authentication flow when clicked by an unauthenticated user

quotes: Login to upload button doesn't work

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the 'Login to Upload' button successfully triggers the Internet Identity login flow
After successful authentication, the button changes to show the file upload interface
Error states are handled gracefully with toast notifications
The button remains responsive on mobile devices as shown in the screenshot

requirements.text: Verify that the VideoUpload component properly accesses the login function from the useInternetIdentity hook and invokes it when the 'Login to Upload' button is clicked
acceptanceCriteria: The VideoUpload component correctly imports and uses the useInternetIdentity hook
The login function is properly bound to the button's onClick handler
Console errors related to the authentication flow are resolved

constraints: Do not modify the useInternetIdentity hook implementation
Maintain the existing visual design and button styling shown in the screenshot
Preserve the authentication state checking logic
nonGoals: Modifying the Layout component's login button (which works correctly)
Adding new authentication methods beyond Internet Identity
